ASAP-R.BK.long_name: Synergetic Auto Performance Public Company Limited
ASAP-R.BK.summary: Synergetic Auto Performance Public Company Limited provides car rental services in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Car Rental, Selling of Used Cars, and Renting Property. The company offers operating leasing services for corporate customers; short-term car rental services for ordinary customers; limousine rental services for corporate customers; and car rental services through an asap application. It also operates Lifestyle Mall, a car rental center and complete used cars, which include food and beverage outlets; and asap select franchises that are service centers for short-term car rentals and second-hand car sales. In addition, the company provides car maintenance services. It offers services under asap brand name. Synergetic Auto Performance Public Company Limited is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

CRANE-R.BK.summary: Chu kai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the trading, repairing, maintenance, rental, and transportation of cranes, forklifts, excavators, trailers, and trucks in Thailand. It rents heavy machines for lifting, assembling, installing, and moving materials and equipment. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

CRANE.BK.summary: Chu kai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the trading, repairing, maintenance, rental, and transportation of cranes, forklifts, excavators, trailers, and trucks in Thailand. It rents heavy machines for lifting, assembling, installing, and moving materials and equipment. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

KCAR-R.BK.long_name: Krungthai Car Rent and Lease Public Company Limited
KCAR-R.BK.summary: Krungthai Car Rent and Lease Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides operating lease in car rental business in Thailand. The company is also involved in buying, selling, and exchanging used and unused cars and spare parts. In addition, the company offers car maintenance services, such as fitting and repairing services; and car insurance and replacement services, as well as third party insurance. It serves individuals; and corporate customers, including government agencies, state enterprises, and private sector. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PL-R.BK.summary: Phatra Leasing Public Company Limited provides leasing services primarily to corporate enterprises in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Land Vehicles and Others segments. The company offers various types of vehicles, such as executive cars, business cars, service cars, or trucks, as well as business jets and various types of commercial leasing. It also leases other machinery, computers, and general equipment. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
